result.purpose: Defines various types and structures used throughout the application, including string enums, wrapped addresses, and large integers.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating type definitions and related functionalities in separate files for better organization and maintainability.

pkg/types/string-enums.go.purpose: Defines a StringEnum interface for types that can provide a string value and a list of string values.

pkg/types/wrapped-address.go.purpose: Defines a wrapped address type for Ethereum and Solana addresses with validation and serialization methods.

pkg/types/wrapped-big.go.purpose: Defines a BigInt type for handling large integers with various base conversions.

pkg/types/wrapped-string.go.purpose: Defines a NonEmptyStr type that ensures a string is non-empty and provides JSON marshaling/unmarshaling.
